tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE in_game_store (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    item_name TEXT,
    item_price DECIMAL,
    currency TEXT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    item_id INT,
    item_name TEXT,
    item_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE in_game_purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Purchase (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL
);
